types.html:
nganda m or f (plural nganda)

  1. (Congo RDC) bar
    • 2014, In Koli Jean Bofane, Congo Inc., Babel, published 2016, page 117:
      Isookanga et Aude Martin prirent place sur des casiers de bière dans un nganda aux alentours de l'avenue du Commerce.
      Isookanga and Aude Martin sat down on some beer racks in a bar near Avenue de Commerce.

title: nganda
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /nɡɑ̃.da/
